info.title: Yahoo Finance
info.description: Yahoo Finance API helps to query for all information about finance summary, stocks, quotes, movers, etc... as on official website.

parameters.name: frequency
parameters.description: Allow one of following : 1d|1wk|1mo

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Allow one of following : history|div|split

parameters.name: period1
parameters.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds, must be different from 'period2', and the value must be starting of a day to get whole data in day.

parameters.name: period2
parameters.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds, must be different from 'period1', and the value must be starting of the later day to get whole data in all previous days.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint.

get.description:
*This endpoint is deprecating
Get data in Historical Data section

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint.

get.description: Get data in Statistics section

parameters.name: period2
parameters.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds, such as 1562170150, must be different from period1, and the value must be starting of the next day to get whole data in previous day. Don't use together with range parameter.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

parameters.name: period1
parameters.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds, such as 1556816400, must be different from period2, and the value must be starting of a day to get whole data in day. Don't use together with range parameter.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed 1m|2m|5m|15m|60m|1d

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed 1d|5d|1mo|3mo|6mo|1y|2y|5y|10y|ytd|max. Do not use together with period1 and period2.

get.description: Get data to draw full screen chart

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint.

get.description: Get data in Statistics section

parameters.name: start_uuid
parameters.description: The uuid of first newsfeed in a list (max 10 newsfeed per request), pass empty to load the first 10 latest newsfeed.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Pass "generalnews" to get general latest newsfeed or a specific symbol

get.description:
*This endpoint is deprecating
Get general latest newsfeed or specific newsfeed by symbol

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint.

get.description:
*This endpoint is deprecating
Get latest news related to a symbol, the result may be empty if there is no news in that region

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint.

get.description: Get data in Major Holders tab in  Holders section

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds, must be different from 'to', and the value must be starting of a day to get whole data in day.

parameters.name: events
parameters.description: Pass this param multiple times to get more related events (div|split|earn), such as : &events=div&events=split&events=earn

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds, must be different from 'from', and the value must be starting of the later day to get whole data all previous days.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Allowed values are (1d|5d|1mo|3mo|6mo|1y|2y|5y|max)

get.description:
*This endpoint is deprecating
Get stock histories to draw chart

parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint

parameters.name: period2
parameters.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds, must be different from period1, and the value must be starting of next day to get whole data in previous day.

parameters.name: period1
parameters.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds, must be different from period2, and the value must be starting of a day to get whole data in day.

get.description: Get Income Statement data in  Financials section

parameters.name: start_uuid
parameters.description: Get suitable value of more/result/uuid returned right in this endpoint to load news in the next page

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: One of the following : generalnews or videofeed or symbol (only one at a time)

get.description:
*This endpoint is deprecating
List latest general news or video feeds or news relating to a symbol, the result may be empty if there is no news in that region

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../news/v2/list endpoint. Ex : 375879c0-08f3-32fb-8aaf-523c93ff8792

get.description: Read the specific news in details

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The value of uuid field returned in .../news/list endpoint. Ex : 375879c0-08f3-32fb-8aaf-523c93ff8792

get.description:
*This endpoint is deprecating
Read the specific news in details

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

parameters.name: snippetCount
parameters.description: The number of items per response for paging purpose

post.description: List latest general news or video feeds or news relating to a symbol, the result may be empty if there is no news in that region

Raw.value: Pass in the value of uuids field returned right in this endpoint to load the next page, or leave empty to load first page

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Any familiar term or phrase to get auto complete suggestions

get.description:
*This endpoint is deprecating
Get auto complete suggestion by term or phrase

parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

parameters.name: symbols
parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint. Separated by comma for multiple entities.

parameters.description: The value of userId field returned in .../market/get-popular-watchlists endpoint.

parameters.name: pfId

parameters.name: symbols
parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint. Separated by comma for multiple entities.

get.description: Get performance information of specific watchlist

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed ASIA | EU | US | AU | BR | CA | FR | DE | HK | IT | ES | GB | IN | SG

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed en-US|pt-BR|en-AU|en-CA|fr-FR|de-DE|zh-Hant-HK|en-IN|it-IT|es-ES|en-GB|en-SG

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The offset to start to get quotes for paging purpose

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of quotes to display in day gainers / losers / activies (max 6)

get.description:
*This endpoint is deprecating
The live day gainers / losers / actives in specific region

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

get.description:
*This endpoint is deprecating
Get live summary information of market by region

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

get.description: Get latest trending tickers in the market

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items returned (up to 100)

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: The main region to get summary information from (AU | CA | FR | DE | HK | US | IT | ES | GB | IN)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date - unix timestamps in milliseconds, the value must be different from startDate, and the value must be starting of the later day to get whole data in all previous days. (Interval between start & end date is up to 14 days)

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date - unix timestamps in milliseconds, the value must be different from endDate, and the value must be starting of a day to get whole data in day. (Interval between start & end date is up to 14 days)

get.description: Get recent earnings in the market

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Allowed values are (5m | 15m | 1d | 1wk | 1mo)

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Allowed values are (1d | 5d | 3mo | 6mo | 1y | 5y | max)

parameters.name: symbols
parameters.description: The symbol to get data, separated by comma to get data for multiple symbols.

get.description: Used with .../market/get-trending-tickers endpoint together to draw brief chart.

parameters.description: One of the following is allowed ASIA | EU | US | AU | BR | CA | FR | DE | HK | IT | ES | GB | IN | SG

parameters.description: One of the following is allowed en-US|pt-BR|en-AU|en-CA|fr-FR|de-DE|zh-Hant-HK|en-IN|it-IT|es-ES|en-GB|en-SG

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of items per response for paging purpose (max 25)

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The starting offset for paging purpose

get.description: The live day gainers / losers / actives in specific region

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One of the following is allowed US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|SG

parameters.description: Allowed values are (5m | 15m | 1d | 1wk | 1mo)

parameters.description: Allowed values are (1d | 5d | 3mo | 6mo | 1y | 5y | max)

get.description: Get data to draw chart for a specific symbol and its comparisons

get.description: The quotes by symbols

parameters.name: userActivity
parameters.description: Whether or not return current number of interacting users

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: One of the following createdAt | popular

parameters.name: off
parameters.description: The offset to start loading messages. It is fixed at 10 messages returned per response. Ex : 0 -> 9 -> 19 -> 29 -> 39 -> ...

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint

parameters.name: messageBoardId
parameters.description: The value of messageBoardId field returned in .../market/get-quotes endpoint
